item.title: DC plane crash live updates: Crews awaiting machinery to extract remaining victims
item.description: An American Airlines regional jet went down in the Potomac River near Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport.

item.title: Patients who allegedly got fake Botox or Botox from unlicensed injectors speak out
item.description: Joey Luther was arrested last week and charged with wire fraud, smuggling and distributing counterfeit drugs for allegedly selling fake Botox.

item.title: These prices could climb within days if Trump slaps tariffs on Canada and Mexico
item.description: The Trump administrations says the tariffs will take effect on Feb. 1.
